mapper.sql: id, shopName, companyId, companyName, companyAccount, bannerUrl, updateTime, opreatorId, status,reason
mapper.select:
select
from t_m_shop where 1=1
and companyAccount like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
and companyName like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
and shopName like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')

update t_m_shop
shopName = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
companyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

reason = #{reason,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_m_shop set shopName = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyId = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, companyName = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyAccount = #{companyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bannerUrl = #{bannerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opreatorId = #{opreatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select shopName,bannerUrl from t_m_shop where companyId = #{id} and status = 2
